body:
Ok, so I can record in 60 fps, then i render/edit in 60 fps and all is good... Then when I upload it it comes out as 260p...
This angers me because it took me 4 hours to get everything ready for 60 fps then youtube fails...
please help me
body_tagged:

title: YouTube 60 fps help!

replies.body:
Usually, a newly uploaded video has potato quality. Just wait awhile and it'll go up to whatever.

Hope this helps!
